title: In Bura!: Bishoujo Kyuuketsuki no Hazukashii Himitsu
original_name: いんブラ！～美少女吸血鬼の恥ずかしい秘密～
sinopse:
After an accident our protagonist Amagami Kouichi becomes involved with Itanami-san a well known beauty of his school and secretly a vampire.

(Source: MU)

Included one-shot:
Volume 2: Omaneki Are!
